title: Man for the job
creator_credit: Margaret Smith, Gregory Clegg and British Broadcasting Corporation
brief_description:
Episode number 1 of Series “Personnel Management”.
Explains job analysis and techniques of ability testing, illustrated by two case studies of applications from the personnel manager’s point of view.
creator_credit_for_label: Margaret Smith, Gregory Clegg and British Broadcasting Corporation
